mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.description, c.icon, c.parent_id, c.sort_order, COALESCE(c.article_count, 0) as article_count, c.create_time, c.update_time FROM t_category c ORDER BY c.sort_order ASC, c.id ASC
